issues.title: <ul> and <ol> must only directly contain <li>, <script> or <template> elements
issues.description: Ensure that lists are structured correctly

none.message: List element has direct children that are not allowed: #text

Fix all of the following:
  List element has direct children that are not allowed: #text

issues.title: Lists do not contain only `<li>` elements and script supporting elements (`<script>` and `<template>`).
issues.description: Screen readers have a specific way of announcing lists. Ensuring proper list structure aids screen reader output. [Learn more about proper list structure](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/list).

automatic.name: Size; Target Size; Element too small

issues.title: Touch targets do not have sufficient size or spacing.
issues.description: Touch targets with sufficient size and spacing help users who may have difficulty targeting small controls to activate the targets. [Learn more about touch targets](https://dequeuniversity.com/rules/axe/4.10/target-size).

node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  Target has insufficient size (35.7px by 17px, should be at least 24px by 24px)
  Target has insufficient space to its closest neighbors. Safe clickable space has a diameter of 12.2px instead of at least 24px.
